title: I'm MirFarzam
subtitle: The Batman Ninja
description: Python Developer and Machine Learning and BigData Engineer

items.content: My name is Seyedfarzam Mirmoeini. I'm a Student at Polytechnic University of Madrid. I study Master of Data Science there. I'm python developer and I also develop java, but I really prefer to develop python. If I you think I can help you, please send an message to me on Linkedin.
